attributes.action: Fund more places for Dialectical behavioral therapy (D.B.T)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dialectical behavioral therapy (DBT) is a psychological method developed to treat persons with borderline personality disorder (BPD).
I have been told i need this treatment to help me on the road to recovery but due to lack of goverment funding i have to wait 2 - 3yrs before i can have this treatment as the NHS only fund 12 places in each mental health outpatient centre that run this course each year. We need more places funded so more people can have this treatment.
